summary:
Presently Mr. Luichjes is active as Independent Senior Consultant, after almost a decade being active as Director Agricultural Department of PLANET Consultants B.V. at Almere, The Netherlands.
Before, he performed from 1990 until end 1998 the function of General Manager of International Dairy Consultants B.V. at Emmeloord, The Netherlands.
Since 1992 and until 1999 he was at the same time appointed as Director of Nethconsult’s (Multidisciplinary Group of Netherlands Consultants – Foundation) Product Market Group, PMG ‘Agro’.
       More than 20 years he was privately active as Feed Mill Manager (national own business as well internationally) followed by a decade of international advisory, through which he gained lots of experience. 
	Further, on regularly base he was practically involved as Project Manager or Project Director in numerous projects all over the world. Projects mainly executed by International Dairy Consultants (IDC) and Gascoigne Melotte (Holding Company of IDC), PLANET Consultants BV and by some international operating Agricultural Consulting Firms.

Specialties: Macedonia	: 2000 – 2003   Integrated Dairy Farming and Dairy Processing Project
Moldova	: 1999 – 2003 Establishing a Horticultural Service Centre, 
Armenia	: 1999 - 2006 Dairy Farming and Dairy Processing
P.R. of China: 1992 – 1997 EU Food Aid Dairy Development Project P.R. of China	: 1997 – 1998 EU Dairy development  
Ukraine	: 1993 – 1997 JSC Netherlands-Ukrainian Agro projects
Ukraine	: 1996 – 1998 Post Privatisation Project Lviv  
Kuwait	: 1993 – 1994 Veterinarian Organization

profile_positions.description:
Presently Mr. Luichjes is active as Independent Senior Consultant, after almost a decade being active as Director Agricultural Department of PLANET Consultants B.V. at Almere, The Netherlands.
Before, he performed from 1990 until end 1998 the function of General Manager of International Dairy Consultants B.V. at Emmeloord, The Netherlands.
Since 1992 and until 1999 he was at the same time appointed as Director of Nethconsult’s (Multidisciplinary Group of Netherlands Consultants – Foundation) Product Market Group, PMG ‘Agro’.
       More than 20 years he was privately active as Feed Mill Manager (national own business as well internationally) followed by a decade of international advisory, through which he gained lots of experience. 
	Further, on regularly base he was practically involved as Project Manager or Project Director in numerous projects all over the world. Projects mainly executed by International Dairy Consultants (IDC) and Gascoigne Melotte (Holding Company of IDC), PLANET Consultants BV and by some international operating Agricultural Consulting Firms.
profile_positions.title: Director Agricultural Department

profile_positions.description: Project title: Re-initiating of Animal Breeding and Set-up of an Agro Service Centre in Stepanavan, Lori Marz.The project aims at creating further conditions conducive to the revival of the dairy sector in Armenia. The approach to dairy improvement (Dairy and Beef) through crossbreed (Caucasian Brown X Jersey) will be continued. A forerunner for a national Identification and Regestration (I&R) was included. Further the Agro Service Centre will be an objective for rendering full support to small private farmers and function as an instrument for quality improvement through applied farm support based on milk testing by own laboratory. The chain approach complemented by fully support to large food supply companies (meat- and milk processing) in product development and marketing activities in the former USSR. Activities in Armavir Region were: a) starting breeding activities, b) selection and designing farm buildings, c) improvement of meat products and processing afficiency, d) improvement of feed supply. Finally set-up test fields for soybeans growing in Armavir and Lori in coöperation with the Seed Institute in Etchmiadzin.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.location: Western NIS ( Belarus, Ukraine and Moldova)
profile_positions.description: Tacis National Coordination Units Project for NIS and Mongolia. The project is to improve and strengthen the planning and coördination capacities of partner governments (Armenia, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, Mongolia, Russia, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan, Ukraine, Uzbekistan) in relation to EU support and related external assistance programmes. Project counterparts (NCU's) are those public administrations responsible for EU and other external aid planning and management (Government Ministries, Cabinet of Ministers, President's Administrations.
profile_positions.title: Regional Director

profile_positions.description: Project title: "Set up of quality control of raw milk production in the Dairy Sector in Romania".The assignment was to verify the feasibility and the indepth detailing of the project,identified by Senter International, The project aimed to contribute to the accession in the European Union. In particular to assist Romania with the implementation of directive 46/92/EEG laying down the health rules for the production and placing on the market of raw milk, heat-treated milk and milk-based products. Regarding food safety the relevant Romanian Institutes such as test laboratories, asked for strengthening in order to improve their productivity.Further the administrative capacity should be improved for implementing the EC acquis in this field and to accelerate.
profile_positions.title: Senior Expert

profile_positions.description: Project title goes "Agriculture and Agribusiness in Bulgaria". Milk collection, an integrated approach. The project aims: 1) to improve and increase the supply of milk, 2) to increase the benefit of the ready products to enable a fair price to the farmers and a sustainable milk supply. Several pilot farms showing the possibilities of modern dairy farming, further improvements in processing (Yoghurt line) of Bulagotrade, coóperation with the veterinay Station, the Agricultural Institute in Ruse and support to Tomika (stainless steel) and Keltech (agricultural equipment and consultancy). The project encompasses management and marketing support, incl. technical advice and product development.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: Project title goes "Agriculture and Agribusiness in Macedonia".Dairt Farming and Processing an integrated approach.Project aims: 1) improve and increase the support of milk, 2) increase the benefits of the ready products to enable a fair price to the farmers and a sustainable milk supply.Several pilot farms showing the possibilities of a modern dairy farming, all in coöperation with the Agency of Development of Agriculture in Macedonia, the Veterinarian Station and the Agricultural University. Laktis Dairy Plant installed, incl. marketing support and product development.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: Executing "Dairian-2 Improvement of Dairy Farming and Dairy Processing in Lori Marz. It includes: 1) provide TA and equipment for the establishment of local dairy fatming systems, 2) provide TA and equipment for the establishment of a small dairy processing unit to add value to the milk produced. 3) be instrumental in creating commercial activities between Armenia and The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: Carrying out an evaluation on two running agricultural projects in the Leningrad Oblast, namely 1) "Initial Technical Assistance to Two Commercial Companies" based on KASP Experience, Russian Federation and 2) "Establishment of a Distribution Centre in Gatchina". The main purpose is to create a cantre for the trade and distribution of vegetables for the St.Petersburg Region
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor

profile_positions.description: Project title goes "Double Harvest Project in Moldova". The project aims to strengthen the business of the recipient, DAAC Plant, a young plant and vegetable producer and the associated farmers. Main activities are; 1) Post-harvest activities for vegetables  (Molda Fresh product) and 2) Flower production (Flower Fresh project). Next to TA, facilities are included for sorting grading/packing and cooling of products for vegetable section and for flower production the introduction of various forms of production, i.e. potplants, flowers and bedding plants. 3) Support to the Management of production-companies involved, 4) to strengthen their marketing by reinitiating former network of markets.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description: Realising in the project called "Moldova Future Vegetable Garden" , a commercial feasible and sustainable production of the Moldovian horticulture chain and strengthening of a commercial relations between Dutch- and Moldovian parties in the agribusiness sector. The project purpose goes "Establishment an Horticulture Service Centre for growers" by means of several units.
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor Marketing and Monitoring

profile_positions.description: Evaluating a large dairy and livestock integrated project financed by the German Authorities and excuted in close coöperation with Turkish and local companies.Drafting a proposal for an Agricultural Service Centre and identifying a large integrated dairy farm. Completing a study for a market strategy as well for a dairy processing plant as a meat processing plant.
profile_positions.title: Senior Adviser

profile_positions.description: Heading a fact-finding mission to carry out a feasible approach of an extension phase of "Assistance for improvement of Private Livestock Sector ", initiated in 1994 and terminated in 1997. The main components were an overview of a dairy plant, a set-up of milk collection network, status of farmers' association and identify commercial agribusiness.
profile_positions.title: Project Identification Expert

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the development of bankable business plans for three projects in the sectors; dairy, poultry and potatoes.Taken into account the chain approach and sustainability. Furthermore develop criteria for selecting one of the three projects for implementation based on synthesized busines plans.
profile_positions.title: Team Leader

profile_positions.description: EU support to post-privatisation in LVIV Region, aiming to improve efficiency of privatised enterprises through - practical support to the creation and organisation of independent assistance centres, - implementation of global restructuring programmes for selected enterprises, -proper information of organised groups of shareholders about restructuring goals and process implementing of portfolio in companies. The project executed in coöperarion with KPMG (Netherlands) BNP (France) and Dresdner Bank (Grmany)
profile_positions.title: Associated Project Director

profile_positions.description: Responsible for project design and preparation, further the overall coördination, implementation and monitoring, tendering for equipment and machinery for the extension of a pilot project within the framework of the Netherlands-Ukraine Agricultural Coöperation Programme (ACI). The projects aimed to introduce Dutch Agricultural Technology in LVIV Region and for support to the privatisation process. Furthermore involvement as feed mill specialist in fact-finding and monitoring missions and support of the management of a joint stock company in LVIV.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management / Feed Milling Expert

profile_positions.description: In the Food Aid Dairy Development Project performed Studies and TA for the development of dairy farming and milk processing in twenty municipalities (strategic studies, TA to dairy farm and milk processing plants, TA to equipment manufacturing). project is executed in co-operation with Euroconsult and Haskoning (The Netherlands)
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: Technical assistance in Plant maintenance and spare parts management to the milk plants of  Misr Milk and Food Company in Cairo and Alexandria (incl. training). Further development of a Business Plan and a comprehensive human resources deployment plan for three processing plants of Misr Milk Company
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Performing "A Study on the Development of Veterinarian Advisory and Service Organisation in Kuwait" All executed within the framework of the agricultural reconstruction policy. Further responsible for the inception phase and the technical coördination and logistical support for the execution of the study.
profile_positions.title: Director Project Management

profile_positions.description: Study of Technical Assistance to the Milk and Meat Sectors and Privatisation of the Sovkhozes and Wholesale and Retail Traders in the Samara District.Sector review, masterplan, management and training programmes for the dairy,meat and retail/wholesale distribution sectors
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description: Technical Assistance to the development of an animal husbamdry research station of Malaysian Agricultural Research and Development Institute, Kuala Lumpur.
profile_positions.title: Project Director

profile_positions.description: Arab Development Society Dairy Plant. Technical Assistance to the rehabilitation and upgrading of ADS dairy plant.
profile_positions.title: Project Officer

profile_positions.description: UNIDO / Saudi Consulting House. Techno-economic study on development of the dairy sector in K.S.A.
profile_positions.title: Project Officer

profile_positions.description: Involved in a PHARE/EC project, called The Development of Agricultural Trade.Responsible for conducting training in various aspects of marketing and advising on the establishment of Produce Councils
profile_positions.title: Feed and Feed Milling Expert

profile_positions.description: Executing a strategic study for restructuring of 160.000 ha. land in North-East Germany. It included a "Sector Study" for dairy, meat, cash crops, fruit and vegetables including processing, as well as land re-allotment and tourism.
profile_positions.title: Project Director/animal nutrition expert

profile_positions.description: Executing a fact-finding mission and preparing Terms of Reference concerning the modernisation of 16 farms (LPG's) owned by the Berlin GDR municipality
profile_positions.title: Animal Feed Expert

profile_positions.description: Preparing feed formulations and organizing feed distribution within the Private Farmer Dairy Development Project in Lomza Voivosship
profile_positions.title: Agricultural Advisor

profile_positions.description: Execution of an large animal feed supply programme of the European Commision (PHARE) on supply of feed additives and minerals. Responsible for - identification programme, - tendering procedure, - tendering
profile_positions.title: Consultant livestock industry and feed production

profile_positions.description: Preparing tender documents, execution and guidance for supply and installation of  dairy plant equipment according to EC regulations.
profile_positions.title: Tender specialist

profile_positions.description: Establishing an untraditional feed mill consisting of a straw trearment plant (by Ammonia) and a concentrates plant for producing complete palletised feed for sheep. Training Saudi managers in management and marketing incl. preparing tender documents  for supply of equipment and raw materials and pre-mixes.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor untraditional feed mill and poultry feed mill consultant

profile_positions.description: Responsibility for design of special feed mills in Sao Tomé, within a certain financial budget and suitable for working under local conditions. Activities included advice on equipment specification and adequate tendering procedure within the framework of the UNESCO activities.
profile_positions.title: Feed Mill expert

profile_positions.description: Fact-finding mission for modernisation of 16 state-owned feed mills. Technical assistance and orientation tour to several feed mills within a co-operation agreement between international cooperatives. Furthermore involved with trouble-shooting and identification of fields of cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Animal Feed expert
